name: Echoid - audio arcade game
description:
Headphones are required.
Audio game fully accessible to blind and visually impaired people.

Give your eyes a short rest, make use of your ears for playing!
Listen carefully to where the trap appears and do not let the ball get into it. To control the ball is as simple as ABC -  just use arrows.
This interesting and endless game requires quick reflexes and concentration!
The longer you play, the more points you score, the more difficult your game becomes.
Use left, right arrows and spacebar to play.

U can find free version without ads and in-app purchases in the Google play.
This free version is a lighter version of Echoid game. There are only 2 platforms on which the ball moves, while the full version has 3 of them . The complexity is slightly simplified and limited.
